channel.title: John Corbett on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: ‘And Just Like That’ Writers Expect a Big Reaction to That Episode
item.description: Viewers have had a lot to say about season three of the ‘Sex and the City’ revival series — and Julie Rottenberg and Elisa Zuritsky anticipate there will be feelings around Carrie’s choice in episode
